reviews.review_text: We had a massive flood in our basement and rooter was able to come to our house first thing in the morning - we opted to wait until morning to have them come.  Chris the technician / plumber was so great and  knowledgeable. We felt so supported.  The bill was less than we expected which was a bonus.  Don t hesitate to call them if your own plumber can t make it or if you have an emergency as we did.  Thanks so much
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Very glad we could help! Appreciate the positive feedback Helen

reviews.review_text: I had a great experience from start to finish with Mr. Rooter Plumbing. The technician Chris was on time on agreed ETA. He came in our home to assess the problem and made an estimate prior to doing the work. The estimate price was fair and affordable. Chris was courteous, professional, experienced, speedy and efficient in repairing our toilet that keeps on running. In addition, a big shout out to Mr. Rooter s answering service representative Kim, who has provided such an amazing customer service. She was very pleasant, kind and patient in answering my questions and connecting me with the technician. If you need any plumbing services, I highly recommend Mr. Rooter.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Karen, thank you for your review and for choosing Mr. Rooter as your local plumbing and drain cleaning company. We appreciate the support. Have a great rest of your week!

reviews.review_text: Garburator was busted, very responsive and arranged an appointment super quickly within my schedule. Provided plenty of notice for when technician was due to arrive, they came on time, we re super friendly and explained everything really clearly. Great service for a reasonable price - did an exceptional job and didn t leave any mess. Would definitely use the service again, 10/10.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Georgia! You are describing what we hope everyone experiences when they choose Mr Rooter - consistent standard of excellence

reviews.review_text: I would highly recommend Mr. Rooter for all your plumbing needs.  Kevin responded quickly, was courteous and up front about what needed to be done and supplied a written quote.  The work was done in a timely manner and their service technician Scott was informative and very professional.

After a sewer line collapse, our first call was to Mr. Rooter. They did a great job of cleaning up and then proceeded to repair the line. This was no easy task as it required a 6ft deep x 10ft long trench to be hand dug. This was completed in less than a week! A Herculean task! Kevin at Mr. Rooter then referred us to BC Preferred Restoration to do major repairs in the basement suite. The floor, dry wall and cabinets had to be replaced as they were all contaminated by sewer water. Steve in the head office guided as expertly through the insurance maze. He was responsive and professional. Ivan s work was top notch and we are very pleased with the end product. Mr. Rooter and BC Preferred Restoration took a horrible nasty incident and made it tolerable with a timely professional approach. 5Star experience.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Peter for this very comprehensive and descriptive review of our services. We appreciate both your feedback and your business.

reviews.review_text: My mom had a leak of water outside her house and we didnt know where it came from since it is summer and there is no rain.  I called and Kevin Florkow called me right away to set up a time to see it the next day.  He is very experienced and knew what was the issue and how to go about contacting insurance etc.  All this was done in a day and Kevin contacted the insurance with a quote and immediately approved and the next day people came to start the repairs.  Kevin arranged everything and the job was done quickly and done well.  I will recommend Mr. Rooter for sure.

Thanks for the prompt response, professional service! Our sewer was backing up, damaged both inside and outside of the house. The manager Steve was super helpful throughout the restoration. We definitely recommend Mr Rooter to our friends and family. Again, Thank you Steve
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Kevin Everything goes so smoothly when the Customer Puts their trust in us and follows our recommendations. It was a pleasure working with you !

reviews.review_text: Mr. Rooter was super fast and efficient. The worker who came to our house was very informative and explained everything he was doing. His work was tidy and he was friendly. I would highly recommend this company.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Meg, were pleased to hear that your experience with us was a good one! Thank you for entrusting us with the care of your plumbing and taking a moment to leave this review to share with others. Your review is much appreciated, and we hope you wont hesitate to let us know how we can serve you in the future.

reviews.review_text: Andrey repair a seriously plugged toilet very quickly. He arrived on time after a short urgent notice and we were happy with his service
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for this excellent feedback about one of our terrific team members and the prompt service you received.

reviews.review_text: We have used their services several times and have always found them to be incredibly knowledgeable and dependable. They deliver precisely what they promise each and every time. They have equipment and a crew on the scene within hours of the emergency. Steve K. does an excellent job communicating with us and keeping us up to date on the status of the project from start to finish. By conducting follow-ups, he makes sure we are fully satisfied with his recommendations as the work progresses. Additionally, he makes an effort to resolve any conflicts or problems that arise. Customer satisfaction is readily apparent by the way the entire team interacts with us in a courteous, helpful, and positive manner. The Mr. Rooter team consistently goes above and beyond to ensure that we are satisfied with their work. They have made a lasting impression by working with us and assisting us in the best way possible on every job. We are thoroughly impressed by Steve K. and his teams outstanding performance, which far surpassed our expectations. We highly recommend using Mr. Rooter s services and wouldn t hesitate to utilize them in the future. Jodi & Angelo D., Delta BC Services: Faucet repair , Sump pump repair , Faucet installation , Sewer repair
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Lucas, thank you for your review and for choosing Mr. Rooter as your local plumbing and drain cleaning company. We appreciate the support. Have a great rest of your week!

reviews.review_text: These guys are wonderful. I hope I never have to call them again, but I will not hesitate if I do need them. The technician that came was very professional and took the time to explain what he would be doing. He left the bathroom spotless and ready us.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Dewey! Thanks for this review. I Mr. Rooter. We do our best to provide great service start to finish.

reviews.review_text: Job: Sump pump installation. The plumber, Su arrived on time, explained the job thoroughly, efficient with the installation, and cleaned up after. One of the best services I have had. Highly recommend Su and Mr. Rooter. Thank you.

We had to have my mothers houses main cleaned even though it took twice as long as it should it got. The gentlemen Sahil and his mgr Kevin were very helpful and answered any questions my mom and myself had. Great job. Thanks.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Good morning Heather. Thank you so much for that review and feedback. We do our best to provide service such as you have described and appreciate your business.

reviews.review_text: Kevin and Jas came out to assist with a main sewer line backup.  They were professional and knowledgeable. Jas helped to cut out some large roots from the City s trees that had caused the problem. Jas cleaned up carefully after he completed the job. Kevin provided helpful information and options to our problem. Thank you for your service and professionalism.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Esi, thank you for leaving us this review. Were thrilled that you enjoyed your experience. The Mr. Rooter team will be happy about your feedback. Customer experience and satisfaction is our priority, and your review reaffirms the hard work we put in every day. We really appreciate it. Thank you again for choosing Mr. Rooter Plumbing.

reviews.review_text: Sergiy is a consummate professional. He was thorough and efficient and provided easy-to-comprehend explanations of the required repairs. Highly recommended.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Cam, thank you so much for the positive review! We are so happy that you had a great experience with Mr. Rooter Plumbing. We look forward to working with you again in the future!

reviews.review_text: I called after hours and was Called back within five minutes.    They arranged for a plumber to arrive at 830 the next morning.   Serghy arrived and was amazing.   He was professional, courteous, professional and cleaned up after himself.    I would highly recommend Mr. Rooter to anyone.  Emergency or maintenance !!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Robin, thank you so much for taking the time to leave this review. We really appreciate your business. Please let us know what we can do for you in the future. Thanks again for working with us and have a great day!

reviews.review_text: The tech (Chris C) was punctual and arrived earlier than expected.  He is committed to his job, very courteous  and professional.  He did an excellent job of diagnosing my plugged tub and solved the problem.  He is a keeper.  I will definitely use Mr. Rooter again and recommend to others
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Priya, thank you for sharing your experience with Mr. Rooter Plumbing. Were glad to hear you enjoyed our services. Thanks again for choosing us as your local plumber and have yourself a fantastic day!

reviews.review_text: The young man came and cleaned out two drains leading to the outside that were full of roots. He was so considerate, removed his shoes, put down tarps, and cleaned up after himself. He was very professional and friendly. Thank you for sending such a pleasant young man. He did a great job!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Patricia, thank you for your review of Mr. Rooter Plumbing. Were really glad that you had a positive experience with our team. Thanks again for choosing us as your local plumber and for your kind review. Have a great day!

reviews.review_text: We have called upon Mr Rooter of Vancouver several times now. I have worked with Steve, and he has been awesome!!! He responds to my requests, inquiries with-in a day or two business days.  He helps me understand the problem and what to expect. His team has been very responsive as well and perform their work professionally. Thanks Steve!!!! and the team at Mr Rooter. Service: Toilet repair
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi George, thank you for your review and for choosing Mr. Rooter as your local plumbing and drain cleaning company. We appreciate the support. Have a great rest of your week!

reviews.review_text: I had Egor come by & spend time unblocking half dozen storm drains on our property, he did a great job while I tested him with questions & a good espresso. Feel like Ive known him forever now I certainly would use Mr Rooter again but only if Egor was my technician.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Bill Gordon, thank you for your five-star rating and support. We re glad you had a great experience with us. Thanks again for choosing Mr. Rooter. Have a great day.

reviews.review_text: Fantastic service! I cannot recommend Mr. Rooter enough! I called them on a Sunday evening with concerns about a strong sewage like smell coming from one of my two condo bathrooms. My boyfriend and I had recently moved into this suite and an inspector had told us that one of the toilets had loose pegs / needed the wax ring replaced/resealed. We decided not to use this bathroom until after we had fully moved/settled in to the suite and until the toilet was properly repaired.. but the sudden strong stentch took us by surprise and we knew we needed help. Thankfully Mr. Rooter is 24/7 so you can call and speak with someone ASAP. I cannot even begin to express how kind and patient the receptionist was! They had initially told me that someone would call me back within 10 minutes after I had explained my concerns, yet after waiting 3 hours with no phone call I ended up calling back 2 more times to see what was going on. I understand how annoying this can be, especially when everyone was busy that night with larger tasks, but I was still treated with kindness which was appreciated in the stressful situation. After my third call I got a text from one of the workers (I believe?) saying they could not come by tonight but they were quick to book me in ASAP to have someone come over another day! Thankfully Tuesday morning was free and we were happy to wait. I recieved a call the day before to confirm my appointment and a call the morning of to inform me that the plumber was on their way over / when to expect them by. The communication was excellent! The individual who worked with me today was a blessing! He showed up on time and had a bright personality which helped to relieve my stress. Not only did he do a fantastic job with fixing our toilet, but he took the time to explain/show me what the problem was and how he went about fixing it. There was no need to second guess his work, it spoke for itself! Everything was VERY clean, professional and he was able to help me with a couple extra things he noticed after inspecting the two bathrooms. Every step of the way he kept me informed about cost and didnt pressure me once to try and get more work done. Having the chance to have that conversation and being able to make the call on what to do was great! I was happy to get the additional work done and am beyond pleased with how much better everything is working. The difference is night and day! Thank you so much for providing an excellent service! I will be sure to give you guys a call again should anything come up and will be happy to recommend you to any friends/family looking to have some work done :) Service: Toilet repair
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Krista, thank you for sharing your experience with Mr. Rooter Plumbing. Were glad to hear you enjoyed our services. Thanks again for choosing us as your local plumber and have yourself a fantastic day!

reviews.review_text: Best Plumbing service you can ever have in Vancouver! I tried many other well-known plumbing companies and None of them worked on my greasy kitchen sink! And I treated Mr Rooter as a last resort. Steve spoke with me over the phone with such a confidence that you didn t get from other plumbing companies. I knew this is it! Two lads came over in 1 hour after I hung up the phone and only took 30 mins to clear the pipe with a very professional way, bang bang bang, done! Highly recommended, if your kitchen sink is really clogged! They are the second to none!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Bao, thank you so much for taking the time to leave this review. We really appreciate your business. Please let us know what we can do for you in the future. Thanks again for working with us and have a great day!

reviews.review_text: Sergiy arrived on time and was so nice! Reviewed the rates to be sure I was clear and went through the entire process step by step. He got the repair done and was beyond pleasant and professional. Must also mention that Kim (the rep who booked the appt for me) was absolutely wonderful. So many thanks to both of them for making this  crappy  experience so much better than I had expected!!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Lisa, were pleased to hear that your experience with us was a good one! Thank you for entrusting us with the care of your plumbing and taking a moment to write this review to share with others. Your kind words are much appreciated, and we hope you won t hesitate to let us know how we can serve you in the future.

reviews.review_text: We had a water flow/quality issue with our new unit in Port Moody. I phoned Mr. Rooter and spoke with the Operations Manager, who patiently listened to my concerns and said, while they would certainly like the business, he highly recommended I call the company back who did the original work in the building and ask to speak to their manager of operations, which I did. Once I did that, my unit was serviced the next day and was properly repaired. A huge thanks to Steve at Mr. Rooter, who gave me great advice and the confidence I needed to call the company back! Also, on a completely separate item, my daughter had an issue with her sink in her unit, she called Mr. Rooter and received professional service at a reasonable rate. We both highly recommend Mr. Rooter for your plumbing needs!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Fin, thank you for your review! Were glad to hear that you enjoyed your experience with Mr. Rooter Plumbing. Thanks again for choosing us and have a great day!

reviews.review_text: The team as Mr. Rooter were wonderful to work with. They made sure we understood what was happening and what was needed, then worked quickly to resolve our emergency repair, while patiently walking us step by step through process of filing our insurance claim, ensuring they could provide all the information and documentation our adjuster needed to process the claim efficiently and smoothly. Everyone weve interacted with has been professionally, courteous, friendly, and helpful.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Paulas, thanks for taking a few minutes to provide us with your feedback! We appreciate it and will certainly share it with the entire Mr. Rooter Plumbing team. We look forward to serving you again for all your plumbing and drain cleaning needs.

reviews.review_text: Called Roto Rooter for a same day job at the office--quick and efficient service. Thank you Roto Rooter!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Susan, thank you for taking the time to leave us this review! We strive to provide our customers with an exceptional customer experience during every appointment, which includes showing up on time, performing high quality work that we stand behind and cleaning up when we are done. We look forward to helping you with all your plumbing and drain repair needs in the future. Thank you for choosing us!

reviews.review_text: Wonderful service, very high-quality, very fast, very responsive. From the beginning until the end, it looks like they are working for one of their family members or a close friend. I would recommend them to anyone with no hesitation. Well done.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Glo, thank you for your review and for choosing Mr. Rooter as your local plumbing and drain cleaning company. We appreciate the support. Have a great rest of your week!

reviews.review_text: Called Kevin for an emergency repair on a burst water line. The service was friendly, fairly-priced and most importantly.. SPEEDY and STURDY!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Julian! We are grateful for this terrific feedback and positive review.

reviews.review_text: Toilet bowl was taking way too long to fill.  Tien came and was able to figure out the problem and fixed it pretty quickly.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Laura, thank you for taking the time to leave a review. Were glad to see that you were satisfied with the work done by our team, and we appreciate your support. Thanks again choosing Mr. Rooter Plumbing and have a great day!

reviews.review_text: When another contractor cancelled at the last moment early this morning, I called Mr. Rooter and was told a technician would come over within an hour. The tech, Brent, arrived right on time, and after a careful inspection of our old hot water tank, quickly came up with replacement plan that include bringing everything up to the new required building codes. Brent then went to pick up a new tank and was back within an hour. Brent did very clean and careful work, and was completely finished by 1:30 p.m. He gave us clear instructions about what to do if there were any problems with the new tank or installation...CALL HIM and he would deal with anything on warranty ASAP! He also took the time to explain about the new generation of water tanks along with things we should do to ensure their longevity. He also gave us advice about the need to replace our old water pressure regulator at some time in the near future. All in all we were thoroughly impress with the prompt service and professionalism! We would highly recommend Mr. Rooter !
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Dave, were pleased to hear that your experience with us was a good one! Thank you for entrusting us with the care of your plumbing and taking a moment to write this review to share with others. Your kind words are much appreciated, and we hope you won t hesitate to let us know how we can serve you in the future.

reviews.review_text: Two days before the xmas holidays, we had an emergency water pipe issue with flooding, requiring the main water valve to be shut off. A technician from Mr. Rooter, Jatinder, arrived in under one hour (another service estimated one week) and affected the necessary repair. Excellent and professional service.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi James, were pleased to hear that your experience with us was a good one! Thank you for entrusting us with the care of your plumbing and taking a moment to write this review to share with others. Your kind words are much appreciated, and we hope you won t hesitate to let us know how we can serve you in the future.

reviews.review_text: Awesome service to check for any drainage issues with sumps, toilet, washer dryer, peace of mind to know all are working well, and flushed a line to be extra sure.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Linda, thank you for your review! Were glad to hear that you enjoyed your experience with Mr. Rooter Plumbing. Thanks again for choosing us and have a great day!

reviews.review_text: They are very knowledgeable and helpful.Our pipe burst when it was also raining hard but they manage to restore water within the day. We did not have to pay outright, they applied for insurance reimbursement and finished the job before we got the insurance payment.  Very grateful  for the services they provided. It was an emergency call and within an hour they have a technician to check and immediately started  the job. They made it stress free
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Maria, were pleased to hear that your experience with us was a good one! Thank you for entrusting us with the care of your plumbing and taking a moment to write this review to share with others. Your kind words are much appreciated, and we hope you won t hesitate to let us know how we can serve you in the future.

reviews.review_text: Even though I couldnt accept the service price because I didnt have house insurance, Steve the manager was understanding and generously waived $50 from the inspection fee since he didnt have the change. Service: inspect massive leaking Service: Plumbing leak detection
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Vw, thank you so much for taking the time to leave this review. We really appreciate your business. Please let us know what we can do for you in the future. Thanks again for working with us and have a great day!

reviews.review_text: Igor came out to the service call and his work was fantastic. He was polite, professional, personable and quick. It was probably the best experience I have had with a tradesman in my home, even the cats and the dog took a shine to him. In the future I will most definitely use Mr Rooter again just to see if we can get Igor to come out.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Travis Carpenter, thank you for taking the time to rate your experience with our team. We re glad to see you enjoyed the service. Thanks again for choosing us! Have a great rest of your day.

reviews.review_text: We had a blockage in our sewer and had to call for an emergency service. I was very impressed with the service, from the person on the phone to the plumbers doing the work. Very professional and was pleasantly surprised with the total cost. Would definitely recommend.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Darlene, thank you for your review! Were glad to hear that you enjoyed your experience with Mr. Rooter Plumbing. Thanks again for choosing us and have a great day!

reviews.review_text: Our contractor hit a pipe in our ceiling and we called Mr Rooter in a panic. They arrived within 20 min and fixed the leak. All the other places I called had said they would take at least 3 hours to arrive for an emergency job. If you need quality and responsive service use them!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Kelsey, thank you for your review of Mr. Rooter Plumbing. Were really glad that you had a positive experience with our team. Thanks again for choosing us as your local plumber and for your kind words. Have a great day!

reviews.review_text: This is the second we have used Mr Rooter. On two occasions we have had to have our indoor and outdoor sump pumps replaced. Both times we had water coming into our home and Mr Rooter immediately got to us after I placed an urgent call. They take their time to explain the issue and give you various options. Nothing is done without your consent and there are no hidden costs thrown in, its very clear. Their technicians are lovely and keep you up to date whilst they are working. Both times were stressful events for me, and both times I felt we were very well taken care of. They also helped pass us on to get the damage to our property handled. Sukh was our technician both times and he is absolutely lovely and very calm when handling those situations!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Alexandra, thank you for leaving us this review. Were thrilled that you enjoyed your experience. The Mr. Rooter team will be happy to read what you wrote. Customer experience and satisfaction is our priority, and your review reaffirms the hard work we put in every day. We appreciate your kind words. Thank you again for choosing Mr. Rooter Plumbing.

reviews.review_text: Quick and easy. Technician advised he had an earlier time if we were available.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you! We appreciate your feedback Chris. Always happy to hear from customers who have had good experiences. We are grateful for your business.

reviews.review_text: Fantastic experience! I can not say enough good things about this company and how professional they were. I had a leak in my house of which I tried to locate but could not. The plumber arrived extremely quickly, diagnosed to problem, explained the issue to me and repaired it at a very reasonable price. I am recommending this company to all my friends. Services:
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Travis, thank you so much for this great review! We really appreciate you being a loyal customer and helping to share the word about Mr. Rooter. Were here for your plumbing and drain cleaning needs anytime!

reviews.review_text: The plumber was very friendly and efficient. He resolved the issue very quickly
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Shannen, thank you for taking the time to leave us this review! We strive to provide our customers with an exceptional customer experience during every appointment, which includes showing up on time, performing high quality work that we stand behind and cleaning up when we are done. We look forward to helping you with all your plumbing and drain repair needs in the future. Thank you for choosing us!

reviews.review_text: Igor was fantastic! He gave me a very fair price for the work to fix a badly clogged kitchen sink and did so quickly and in a friendly manner - even though my puppy is in a bark at everything mode right now. I would definitely go to him again if I had any plumbing issues in the future. Booking was also very quick and easy over the phone.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Sarah, thank you for your review of Mr. Rooter Plumbing. Were really glad that you had a positive experience with our team. Thanks again for choosing us as your local plumber and for your kind words. Have a great day!

reviews.review_text: One night our sink stopped draining and became backed up. The next morning I called Mr Rooter and Igor arrived a few hours later. He was excellent. There was some issues finding the exact problem are, however he refused to give up. He was determined and that was greatly appreciated. Highly recommend Igor and Mr Rooter. Her transparent process. Great prices as well. Thank you!!!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much Daryl! We do our best, glad to hear from customers who appreciate the service!

reviews.review_text: Jatinder went above and beyond in his swift response to my call; he diagnosed the cause of the sewage sump backup and overflow, fixed the problem quickly by replacing a burst pipe. Jatinder was professional and courteous, and provided a clear cost estimate at the outset. I would recommend Jatinder highly - he is an asset to his trade. I certainly will use him again should the need arise.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Johann, thank you for your review of Mr. Rooter Plumbing. Were really glad that you had a positive experience with our team. Thanks again for choosing us as your local plumber and for your kind words. Have a great day!

reviews.review_text: It was late in the afternoon so mr rooter had to check their schedule and found someone to come in 1/2 hour to fix a clogged drain pipe. Came on time and worked to problem quickly.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Wilbur, thank you so much for this great review! We really appreciate you being a loyal customer and helping to share the word about Mr. Rooter. Were here for your plumbing and drain cleaning needs anytime!

reviews.review_text: Did a great and quick job of unclogging and repairing a kitchen sink drain. Moderately expensive, but not way out of line imo.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Kris, thank you for sharing your experience with Mr. Rooter Plumbing. Were glad to hear you enjoyed our services. Thanks again for choosing us as your local plumber and have yourself a fantastic day!

reviews.review_text: Impending doom here. Sewer working. Just. Mr. Rooter came and walked us through a minefield. Sewer now working well. Clean out points installed. This was not cheap, but it was NEVER more than quoted. We dodged a bullet. The new toilet they recommended and installed at very competitive cost, is clearly superior to what we had - thanks for that! Met a number of very competent employees at several levels... all were completely honest with us. I recommend. (It has been a little over a month -- all has settled in well!  Even the lawn is alive again where dug up) Services: Plumbing pipe repair , Toilet installation , Sewer repair
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Bob Young! Thank you for taking a moment to rate your experience with the Mr. Rooter team. We re very pleased to learn you re happy with our services, and hope you keep us in mind for any future plumbing work. Have a great day!

reviews.review_text: Arrived promptly, got the job done quickly and professionally

We had a fantastic experience from beginning to end. The telephone assistance was polite, helpful and prompt. Our technician Jas arrived promptly on a Sunday of the July long weekend to our Vancouver home. He was polite and neat. He kept us abreast of the problem by showing us extensive camera/video of the pipe leading out to the city line. It was overgrown with roots at many junctions which he was able to rid of. He left us with a full report and before and after video coverage of the problem for us to forward to the landlords. He made the suggestion that the owners might want to replace the drain pipes at some point as the roots will grow back over time. Has was an 11 out of 10. Simply fabulous. Services: Drain cleaning , Outdoor plumbing system repair
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Andrea Walters, thank you for taking the time to rate your experience with our team. We re delighted to see you re happy with the service. Thanks again for choosing Mr. Rooter. All the best!

reviews.review_text: We had a drainage issue on our sewer line and Mr Rooter took care of the blockage using their appropriate tools.  Speedy response and very good value.  Highly recommend.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Michael, thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. Were glad to hear you enjoyed your experience working with us. Thanks again for choosing Mr. Rooter Plumbing as your local plumbing and drain company and have yourself an awesome day!

reviews.review_text: I called Mr. Rooter to help with a clogged bathroom sink drain at one of my rental suites. The plumber, Tim, was excellent. He was courteous, on time, and very thorough in his explanation of the work required. He also provided an estimate before the work began. He took care of the issue, then called me afterwards to let me know the work was done.  I would definitely recommend Mr. Rooter and Tim, and I appreciate them taking care of our plumbing problem so quickly! Definitely 5 star service
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Wendy Graham, thank you for taking the time to rate your experience with our team. We re glad to see you enjoyed the service. Thanks again for choosing us! Have a great rest of your day.

reviews.review_text: We had water coming out of the toilet and the shower, flooding the bathrooms and into the bedroom, I called Mr. Rooter and they sent Igor within an hour and he was super friendly and efficient, he went way beyond the call of duty, he even cleaned up after he was done. I can t even stress enough how happy I am with the job he did and his friendly demeanour. I will definitely request him next time I need a plumber.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Ryan C, thank you for your five-star rating. We re glad to see you enjoyed your experience with our plumbing team. Thanks again for choosing Mr. Rooter and have yourself a great rest of your day!

reviews.review_text: Your tech was fantastic - knowledgeable courteous, and hard working.  We ll be back
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Doug, thanks for taking a few minutes to provide us with your feedback! Our team appreciates your business and looks forward to tackling your next project. Thanks again!

reviews.review_text: I am honestly extremely relieved I came across this company. I had a washer and dryer delivered yesterday, which service included installation. However, the guys who delivered the machines were not able to complete the job and left everything in disarray. I was left mid-conversation without even knowing who to call to set my machines up. I called Mr. Rooter Plumbing because I wanted to be sure that my machines would be installed properly. Jaswinder was able to come in the very next day, on a Sunday, and did a brilliant job. He ensured that my plumbing was suitable and safe for the machines, and installed them in the span of a half hour. All whilst being professional, really nice, and utterly efficient. Im very grateful I can rely on this company in the future!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Milena Scekic, thank you for taking the time to rate your experience with our team. We re delighted to see you re happy with the service. Thanks again for choosing Mr. Rooter. All the best!

reviews.review_text: Sandeep is a great great guy and very professional and friendly, highly recommend to use him. Good experience working with Mr. rooter as well, very systematic and organized and responsive during the process. Will use them again.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Xu, thank you for your review! Were glad to hear that you enjoyed your experience with Mr. Rooter Plumbing. Thanks again for choosing us and have a great day!

reviews.review_text: Thank you Mr. Rooter for sending Igor B. -- he is awesome! He was punctual, cordial, and very much a professional in his trade. He took his time diagnosing the problem, took the time to lay out his plan of action, and explained everything he was doing along the way. The options he provided afterwards were his expert opinions. Trust is a big thing when it comes to these types of issues and I found him trustworthy all throughout. Definitely our familys go to guy for future emergencies. Thanks for your expertise and the extra tune Igor! Stay safe in your work.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for rating your experience with Mr. Rooter, Max! We really appreciate your support and are thrilled to see you re happy with our services. Please let us know if there is anything else we can do for you in the future. Have a wonderful day!

reviews.review_text: On a Friday night, we noticed a leak coming through our ceiling from an upstairs bathroom and called the first after hours plumber google listed. Mr. Rooter sent someone first thing the next morning. Our service technician, Sandeep, was friendly, professional and did a great job. We were really happy that everything was finished, repaired and installed in the same day!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Haley, thank you so much for this great review! We really appreciate you being a loyal customer and helping to share the word about Mr. Rooter. Were here for your plumbing and drain cleaning needs anytime!

reviews.review_text: The best recommendation that we could give a serviceman is to recommend his services to our friends.   Igor was so professional and efficient that we would gladly recommend him to anyone we know.   He came in discussed the services and costs, and then undertook all the necessary procedures explaining exactly what he was going to do.   Very personable and professional.  Job well done!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Ron McNeill, thank you for taking the time to rate your experience with our team. We re delighted to see you re happy with the service. Thanks again for choosing Mr. Rooter. All the best!

reviews.review_text: Was able to get a plumber quickly. Was not needed as an emergency but still came same day.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Judith. We do our very best to provide prompt excellent service.

reviews.review_text: Igor was an absolute godsend! We had an issue with the toilet not emptying correctly, and Igor took all the steps to diagnose (the rather difficult) issue. He was friendly, quick, efficient and clean. I highly recommend him and his team!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Mel R, thank you for taking the time to rate your experience with our team. We re glad to see you enjoyed the service. Thanks again for choosing us! Have a great rest of your day.

reviews.review_text: Had a hot water tank leak and they sent someone within 24 hrs.  Brent came on time and replaced the tank the same day!  I have used other plumbing services, but always come back to Mr. Rooter because of their expediency and professionalism.   Granted, they are not the cheapest service out there, but they have a set price protocol which they quote to you before they do the work,  and they guarantee their work.  As a customer, all I want is good honest service that comes on time.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Kathryn Reid, thank you for your five-star rating. We re glad to see you enjoyed your experience with our plumbing team. Thanks again for choosing Mr. Rooter and have yourself a great rest of your day!

reviews.review_text: These guys really know what theyre doing.  Sukhjit was fantastic.  He provided efficient, thorough and friendly service.  He gave me options and helped me come to a best case scenario. We had a misaligned outflow pipe that had roots growing into it.  Sukhjit cleared most of them out, scoped the pipe and showed me what was happening and explained the process in detail.  He also gave me confidence in my system in knowing what type of upkeep it would require and an estimated life expectancy. The price was reasonable and fair considering what they are doing and when they responded. I called them on a Sunday and the rate was the same as if I called and booked on a Monday. I would totally recommend these guys. Services: Drain cleaning , Sewer repair
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Trevor Renner, thank you for taking the time to rate your experience with our team. We re glad to see you enjoyed the service. Thanks again for choosing us! Have a great rest of your day.

reviews.review_text: Main drain got blocked on a Sunday afternoon, because if its gonna happen its gonna happen on a weekend of course. Phoned Mr. Rooter and they were able to have someone to my house within an hour for a reasonable price given the time. The work was well done and he went above and beyond by identifying the root cause of the issue and telling us how we could fix it, rather than just clearing the pipe. Thank you Jaswinder!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Taylor Fell, thank you for taking the time to rate your experience with our team. We re glad to see you enjoyed the service. Thanks again for choosing us! Have a great rest of your day.

reviews.review_text: Our Filed Technician Jas Saran was extremely friendly upon his arrival.  He was fast and efficient and was able to complete the task in under 10 minutes. Not only did he fix the blockage from our sink, but he also helped with cleaning up! I couldnt have asked for a better technician to come. Definitely going to request for him in the future if we have any problems.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Jessica Chan, thank you for your five-star rating. We re glad to see you enjoyed your experience with our plumbing team. Thanks again for choosing Mr. Rooter and have yourself a great rest of your day!

reviews.review_text: These guys are fantastic and took care of everything!  My mom was hospitalized, the motor died in my car and other things were happening and then there was water leaking in the bathroom and a bedroom.  Steve at Mr. Rooter was incredible.  He told me not to worry and that he would take care of everything...and he did!  From finding the leak to replacing the pipes all was done.  Then the aftermath, talking to the insurance company all the way to having all the water damage renovations completed.  I will forever be grateful to Steve, Mr. Rooter Plumbing and APL Restorations!  Thank you all so much and I will not hesitate to refer you to all my friends and family.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the five-star rating, Julie K! We really appreciate you for choosing Mr. Rooter as your local plumbing and drain cleaning company. Have a great day!

reviews.review_text: Had a fantastic experience with Jas Saran today! He was extremely knowledgeable, polite, and timely. Without him we would have been totally lost. Have to get this guy a promotion or bonus ASAP! Fair price for the superb service we received. Thanks again!!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi The Conductor! Thank you for leaving a five-star rating, and for choosing Mr. Rooter as your local plumbing and drain cleaning company. We really appreciate your support. Have a great rest of your day!

reviews.review_text: Highly recommend.  My shower was backing up and slowly getting worse. Igor this amazing very helpful and kind technician fixed the problem quickly and gave helpful advice for this to hopefully not happen again.  And then he fixed replaced the seal on my toilet which I mentioned was leaking. Friendly, efficient and all COVID safety precautions followed. A very positive experience.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave this five-star rating, Shelley Shines! We really appreciate your business. Please let us know what we can do for you in the future.

reviews.review_text: This was our second time using the service and as with the first time we were both pleased and impressed by the professionalism and the quality of service delivered.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Cyril, thank you for leaving us this review. Were thrilled that you enjoyed your experience. The Mr. Rooter team will be happy about your feedback. Customer experience and satisfaction is our priority, and your review reaffirms the hard work we put in every day. We really appreciate it. Thank you again for choosing Mr. Rooter Plumbing.

reviews.review_text: The plumber who visited to fix my clogged drain was fantastic. Not just a super friendly and experienced person, but knew exactly what to do and did it properly. He was fast, but completely thorough, and showed me everything, so I had no doubts that everything was done exceptionally.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi David Stoyko! Thank you for leaving a five-star rating, and for choosing Mr. Rooter as your local plumbing and drain cleaning company. We really appreciate your support. Have a great rest of your day!

reviews.review_text: Igor did a superb job! Very professional, straightforward, efficient, and honest. Job was done successfully for a very reasonable and fair price. Will definitely be our go to plumber moving forward.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Lorenzo, thank you for leaving us this review. Were thrilled that you enjoyed your experience. The Mr. Rooter team will be happy to read what you wrote. Customer experience and satisfaction is our priority, and your review reaffirms the hard work we put in every day. We appreciate your kind words. Thank you again for choosing Mr. Rooter Plumbing.

reviews.review_text: Despite the circumstances (blocked drain on Christmas night), this was a great experience and our plumber Jas was very polite and professional and was able to get things fixed very quickly. He arrived right on time and the communication from the company was great. Ive had bad experiences before with other plumbing companies being very late or not even showing up on the day they were scheduled. This was definitely a good experience and was dealt with very expediently. Service:
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Tony, thank you for your review of Mr. Rooter Plumbing of Vancouver. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed the Christmas emergency blocked drain service provided. Thanks again for choosing us and for your kind words. All the best!

reviews.review_text: Igor came to our place and fixed our very clogged drain. He was so wonderful, answered all of our questions, and cleaned up everything when he left. I would absolutely recommend this company. You get a window of time they arrive, so you aren t waiting all day too, can t beat it. Service with a smile is what you want these days when someone is coming into your home.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Bunny, thank you for your review of Mr. Rooter Plumbing of Vancouver BC. We are glad to see you enjoyed the clogged drain service provided by Igor. Thanks again for your support and kind words. All the best!

reviews.review_text: Excellent customer service. Ive used them for my strata projects and for family house projects. Very knowledgeable with insurance claims as well. Top notch every time.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Danielle, thank you for your review of Mr. Rooter Plumbing. Were really glad that you had a positive experience with our team. Thanks again for choosing us as your local plumber and for your kind words. Have a great day!

reviews.review_text: Igor was terrific! He was on time, super professional and incredibly helpful! Based on his recommendations he installed a new toilet for us - he was friendly and efficient! We would recommend him and Mr Rooter to anyone with any plumbing needs! Thank you so much!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Xanthe, Thank you for leaving such a kind review for Igor, and for recommending our team to your friends and family! Please let us know if you have any plumbing issues in the future. Wishing you a wonderful weekend from everyone here at Mr. Rooter Plumbing of Vancouver BC.

reviews.review_text: The technician was very clear and thorough with his explanation of the two problems with my waste lines.  I was shown live camera images of inside the pipes where the problems were occurring and again when the problems were resolved.  The cost stayed as quoted before the work was done.  Im very satisfied with Mr Rooter and would recommend them to my friends.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Robert Whitelaw, thank you for your five-star rating. We re glad to see you enjoyed your experience with our plumbing team. Thanks again for choosing Mr. Rooter and have yourself a great rest of your day!

reviews.review_text: I had issues with my kitchen sink so gave Mr. Rooter an email via their website.  The next day (which was a Sunday), they called me to schedule an appointment for a technician to come by.  They sent Carlos to my place on Monday morning and he arrived a bit earlier than when they said he would, which was perfect.  Not only did he give me the quote off the hop, he also showed me what came out and how to avoid it and maintain a clear drain.  I am so glad he came when he did because it was so inconvenient to use my bathroom sink for everything.  Thanks Mr. Rooter!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your review Jason! We are happy to hear that your technician, Carlos, showed up early for your scheduled appointment and provided you with informative and efficient service for your drains. Thanks again for choosing Mr. Rooter and have a great day.

reviews.review_text: The team and customer service was phenomenal. They took the time to listen and understand my situation and acted promptly to accomodate my schedule. Everything from booking the appointment to having the technician come over and resolve the issue. I was very well please about everything. Huge shout out to the technician Tien( I think it might be pronounced Tim but I could be wrong). If you have the opportunity to schedule or book him, definitely dont hesitate! I highly recommend him
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Ato, thank you for your review of Mr. Rooter Plumbing of Vancouver BC. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed the service provided and that the customer service was phenomenal. We appreciate the kinds words and support. Thanks again for choosing us and for your recommendation. All the best Ato!

reviews.review_text: This was a great experience. John, the South African fellow was really great. He helped us through our plumbing disaster and he made us feel like family. He was friendly, professional and had great knowledge about everything. Two big thumbs up for him and the crew!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you! We are very happy to hear such great feedback about our team!

reviews.review_text: Jaswinder Saran unclogged a drain line leading from our home. He was amazing. He came to our home the same day and was very professional and courteous. He assessed the problem, fixed it, explained what he had done and provided recommendations that would minimize the chance of it occurring again. This is great service and next time I would specifically ask for Jaswinder.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the five-star rating, Michael! We really appreciate you for choosing Mr. Rooter as your local plumbing and drain cleaning company. Have a great day!

reviews.review_text: Our old hot water tank had reached the end of its life and had stopped functioning entirely. I was dreading that the house would be without hot water for at least a couple days, but to my surprise and pleasure Mr. rooter was able to install another one very quickly upon the plumber first coming out. We were fully satisfied with the service we ended up receiving. I would recommend Mr. Rooter for their excellent speed of service and for the patient, friendly, and helpful attitude of their plumbers.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for that great feedback on one of our terrific technicians!

reviews.review_text: very quick response, our plumber was punctual, very professional, and very kind. we can not say enough great things about Tien (i m pretty sure that is his name..). next time we need work done hopefully we can request him. but if he s a representation of the quality of people they hire, you are in great hands.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Gretchen, thank you for leaving us this review. Were thrilled that you enjoyed your experience. The Mr. Rooter team will be happy to read what you wrote. Customer experience and satisfaction is our priority, and your review reaffirms the hard work we put in every day. We appreciate your kind words. Thank you again for choosing Mr. Rooter Plumbing.

reviews.review_text: Igor came to our place right after new year to help with our kitchen pipe. He is efficient, handy, and professional. We had no pipe for 3 days over the new year and it was depressing. Thanks to Igors 20 minute of work, the pipe is no longer clogged properly maintained and with a guarantee. This company and Igor are highly recommended.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much. We always appreciate hearing about the skilled technicians that we have on our team!

reviews.review_text: The young man, Sandeep Panda, who came to fix my clogged sinks, was very polite and courteous.  He explained what he had to do , showed me an estimate of the job, and got to work. He was very pleasant  and answered all my questions. If i need a plumber again in the future, i will certainly request Sandeep..
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Nancy, thank you for leaving us this review. Were thrilled that you enjoyed your experience. The Mr. Rooter team will be happy to read what you wrote. Customer experience and satisfaction is our priority, and your review reaffirms the hard work we put in every day. We appreciate your kind words. Thank you again for choosing Mr. Rooter Plumbing.

reviews.review_text: We called Mr. Rooter after we had made an appointment with another company who didn t even show up or give us a courtesy call to let us know they weren t coming.  After calling Mr. rooter they called us back right away and booked a service window the next day. The plumber Tihn, called and let us know he was on his way.  He showed up on time and was very professional, he did a great job and was very helpful with explaining what he was doing. We would use Mr. Rooter again if needed and hopefully they will send Tihn again. Thank you Service: Drain cleaning
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Kevin Grewal, thank you so much for taking the time to write this five-star review. We really appreciate your business. Please let us know what we can do for you in the future. Thanks again for working with us and have a great day!

reviews.review_text: Igor was amazing! So knowledgeable and so friendly! He was amazing at helping locate the issues and deal with it all the while keeping us informed about what he was doing or what needed to be done! Cant recommend igor enough!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Louis Lay! Thank you for leaving a five-star rating, and for choosing Mr. Rooter as your local plumbing and drain cleaning company. We really appreciate your support. Have a great rest of your day!

reviews.review_text: We hired Mr. Rooter to investigate our perimeter drain system in September 2020. The Mr. Rooter team arrived when they said they would, were very efficient and willing to share a lot of info even beyond the job we hired them for. We were happy to pay the invoice and highly recommend them to anyone seeking plumbing services.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Greg Lutz, thank you so much for taking the time to write this five-star review. We really appreciate your business. Please let us know what we can do for you in the future. Thanks again for working with us and have a great day!

reviews.review_text: Amazing Service! I was completely satisfied! .   Igor is friendly , professional and does not want to leave work undone.   He made sure that all is working and made extra effort to spray and clean the entire work area.    I hope Mr. Rooter would always take care of employee like him.  Great Job Igor!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks! We are grateful for feedback about our amazing team! Igor is a great member of the team!

reviews.review_text: Igor was such a friendly, professional, and lifesaving plumber. He showed up on time and resolved our drainage issue so quickly and thoroughly. Would definitely refer his service to anyone.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Meng, thank you so much for this great review! We really appreciate you being a loyal customer and helping to share the word about Mr. Rooter. Were here for your plumbing and drain cleaning needs anytime!

reviews.review_text: I was very impressed by the quick response time to an on-line request for plumbing service - even on the weekend.  An appointment was quickly set up with a time frame provided.  The techs called and showed up on time and were very professional. I was given a choice of quotes depending on what I wanted done.  Preston (the tech) completed all the tasks competently and everything was checked and working before he left.  He made sure I was shown exactly what was done and then ensured all was cleaned up and any debris taken away.  Thank you Mr. Rooter.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Carolyn! We at Mr Rooter always appreciate hearing about the awesome service our technicians provide.

reviews.review_text: The service was performed in a responsible and reasonable amount of time. Igor was very professional and explained exactly what needed to be done! I would recommend him again. One happy customer!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Karen, thank you for leaving us this review. Were thrilled that you enjoyed your experience. The Mr. Rooter team will be happy to read what you wrote. Customer experience and satisfaction is our priority, and your review reaffirms the hard work we put in every day. We appreciate your kind words. Thank you again for choosing Mr. Rooter Plumbing.

reviews.review_text: I have worked with Sergiy a couple of times and he represents the company very well. Honest, friendly and conscientious. I would not hesitate calling for him again.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Gord, thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. Were glad to hear you enjoyed your experience working with us. Thanks again for choosing Mr. Rooter Plumbing as your local plumbing and drain company and have yourself an awesome day!

reviews.review_text: Phenomenal service. Fast, efficient the quote was spot on my house was treated with care and respect. The second day they came he even brought a little treat for my pup!!! I highly recommend. Had some bad experiences with some workers with other companies in the past but these guys exceeded my expectations.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Tim, thank you for your review! Its great to hear that your experience with Mr. Rooter Plumbing of Vancouver, BC was such a positive one. Our team appreciates your recommendation. We are here for you whenever you require our service. Thanks again for choosing Mr. Rooter and have a great day!

reviews.review_text: We were happy with the service Igor provided as he both solved our plumbing problem and offered suggestions for overall maintenance of our home. Im likely to ask for him should we need assistance in the future based on the quick assistance he gave us
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for rating your experience with Mr. Rooter, Andy Ally! We really appreciate your support and are thrilled to see you re happy with our services. Please let us know if there is anything else we can do for you in the future. Have a wonderful day!

reviews.review_text: Sump pump failure, called and had a technician at my home within an hour. Everything was taken care of immediately, was even given tips on how to troubleshoot to avoid making avoidable call. Very happy with the service speed, and professionalism. Rooter technician made a stressful situation easier to deal with. Would definitely recommend.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Harlan, thank you for your review of Mr. Rooter Plumbing of Vancouver. We are happy to hear that Your technician was able to provide you with prompt sump pump repair service provided. Thanks again for choosing us and for your kind words. Have a great day!

reviews.review_text: We d just like to say how happy we were with the service we received from Senior Technician Dustin Wolrich. He was prompt and courteous and gave us a number of options for the repair for our leaking pipe. The repair was quick and the work area was cleaned up. We highly recommend Mr. Rooter and Dustin and would use your service again.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Gary, thank you for your review of Mr. Rooter Plumbing of Vancouver and your technician Dustin. We are happy to hear that Dustin has provided you with prompt and courteous service and took the time to ensure you understood all your options. Thank you for your recommendation and for choosing Mr. Rooter. Have a great day Gary!

reviews.review_text: Igor arrived within an hour of calling, laid out the charges upfront did a thorough job cleaned up after unblocking the washer,  he ran 2 washer cycles to test that drain was cleared! Very pleasant and courteous!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the five-star rating, Mike Cardwell! We really appreciate you for choosing Mr. Rooter as your local plumbing and drain cleaning company. Have a great day!

reviews.review_text: Called a local independent service... all for supporting them, but a $200 surcharge because it was the weekend, and they wouldnt be there until 4 or 5 PM!?!? Called Mr. Rooter at 9:15AM they said they would have someone out within the hour and that were their in 45min! Sandi was the technician, very professional and helpful.  $335 and change and it was done! Half of what the local independent was charging!!! Again all for supporting local, but they also need to be somewhat competitive.  Thanks Sandi and the Mr.Rooter team!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Zak Rhajiak, thank you for taking the time to rate your experience with our team. We re glad to see you enjoyed the service. Thanks again for choosing us! Have a great rest of your day.

reviews.review_text: Thank you Jas Saran for coming out on a Thursday evening to take care of a clogged kitchen line. Service was fast (all done in less than an hour) and technician is super friendly. I will definitely recommend Mr Rooter Plumbing to my friends and family for their plumbing needs.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Jenica Muliani, thank you for taking the time to rate your experience with our team. We re delighted to see you re happy with the service. Thanks again for choosing Mr. Rooter. All the best!

reviews.review_text: Preston came into our store today(Sunday May 12) and fixed our major plumbing issue. He had spend a lot of time roughly 2.5 hours trying to find the solution and he did. In all my years of having to call a plumber he was the most polite, clean and friendly plumber I have seen. He fixed the problem explained every step of the process with me, and even cleaned the bathroom which was a huge surprise. He did what the other plumber we called on Saturday could not do, it was a hard job to find the blockage. I will highly recommend Mr. Rooter to anyone and have them ask for Preston he was awesome and very professional.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank Mike! To help remember who to call next time you need a plumber one of our slogans is  There s a reason they call us Mr!  We re Mr Rooter not RotoRooter :) Very glad to hear our technician Preston found a solution and gave great service!

reviews.review_text: My husband and I were very impressed with the service from Mr. Rooter Vancouver. Our drains backed up into the basement on a Saturday night. First thing Sunday morning, Jaswinder arrived - in the middle of a snow storm. He was efficient, professional, organized, clean and managed to keep the problem well contained - not easy in this case.  And then he solved the very ugly problem in 2hours. We expected it to take twice as long and cost twice as much. He gave us great advice about options for the permanent fix (it was roots in the drain) but he fixed it so we dont have to think about it for a long time, if we choose (dont worry Jaswinder, we wont!) The call centre person was also great - called back several times to give us updates on her search for a technician and when he would arrive, etc. Highly recommend this company and Jaswinder in particular.  Thanks for salvaging our drains and our weekend! Service: Drain cleaning
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much Maureen! Appreciate this awesome feedback! Happy Valentine s Day
